name: Turtle Out (RedHeadGames)
description:
Welcome to Turtle Out!

This is a spiritual successor to the original ATARI game "Break Out".

Gain the highest score by destroying the turtles with the basket ball and catching the rabbits as they fall. Destroy all turtles to win the game!

How To Play:

Download the zip file attached below. Once downloaded extract the files and then run the .exe file to start the game.

Controls:

Left & Right Arrow OR A & D: Move the paddle left and right. 

Best of luck!
